overview:
## Discussion

The `rowSizeStyle` property is set by the `NSTableView` to its [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSTableView/effectiveRowSizeStyle]. The cell view will layout the [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSTableCellView/textField] and [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSTableCellView/imageView] based on the `rowSizeStyle`.

A value of [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSTableView/RowSizeStyle-swift.enum/default] should never be set on the cell view, as it is an appropriate value only for the table as it returns the effective row size style for the table.

# rowSizeStyle

**Instance Property**

Returns the row size style.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var rowSizeStyle: NSTableView.RowSizeStyle { get set }
```

## Discussion

The `rowSizeStyle` property is set by the `NSTableView` to its [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSTableView/effectiveRowSizeStyle]. The cell view will layout the [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSTableCellView/textField] and [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSTableCellView/imageView] based on the `rowSizeStyle`.

A value of [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSTableView/RowSizeStyle-swift.enum/default] should never be set on the cell view, as it is an appropriate value only for the table as it returns the effective row size style for the table.
title: rowSizeStyle
